references.paper_title: Multimodal prompt perceiver: Empower adaptiveness, generalizability and fidelity for all-in-one image restoration
references.reason: This paper proposes a novel multimodal prompt perceiver model for all-in-one image restoration, which is highly relevant to the core methodology of RestoreAgent.

references.paper_title: Retinexformer: One-stage retinex-based transformer for low-light image enhancement
references.reason: This paper introduces a one-stage retinex-based transformer model for low-light image enhancement, providing a state-of-the-art method for a specific degradation type handled by RestoreAgent.

references.paper_title: Masked image training for generalizable deep image denoising
references.reason: This paper explores a masked image training approach for generalizable deep image denoising, addressing a key challenge in image restoration that is relevant to RestoreAgent's task of handling multiple degradations.

references.paper_title: Low-res leads the way: Improving generalization for super-resolution by self-supervised learning
references.reason: This work focuses on improving generalization in super-resolution, which is crucial for the robustness and adaptability of RestoreAgent in handling various degradation types.

references.paper_title: Minigpt-v2: Large language model as a unified interface for vision-language multi-task learning
references.reason: This paper presents Minigpt-v2, a large language model serving as a unified interface for vision-language multi-task learning.  This is highly relevant to RestoreAgent's architecture which leverages a multimodal large language model for intelligent image restoration.
